title: Nocturne Visual Bug
body: It only happened in one match of mine (first match as nocturne actually), basically, nocturnes little wispy-leg replacement wasn't appearing, so it was pretty much just a floating chest & up with no black smokey-smoke under it.

replies.body: Yeah, during loading screen to shut off music. Sorry for the late response!

Hey Moosimo,

Thanks for the report! Did you happen to alt tab during this particular match?
